casebody.data:
Austin E. Jaquith v. Amos Hale. Motion: Statement of grounds: A motion to dismiss, which fails to state the grounds upon which the motion is based, will not he entertained. Heard and decided October 6. Certiorari to Amos Hale, assessor, etc. Moore & Moore, for defendant in certiorari,

moved to dismiss.

F. A. Balcer, for plaintiff in certiorari,

objected to the hearing of the motion, because in it no grounds are stated upon which it is based.

The Court

held the objection well taken, and denied *the motion, with costs.
